name: CatchTheEgg
description:
CatchTheEgg is a egg catching game, where you have to catch eggs to survive.

Avoid catching rotten eggs, eggs with Black color, catch  eggs and survive till the end!

For the time being, I have set a time of 5 mins. MainMenu and other screens are disabled for the time being, as I improve and add more features to the game.

Tilt the phone to move the bowl, soon there's plans to implement Buttons, Joysticks and more!

This is my first Android game and it's  only 1 week old, so please don't expect much. Thank you very much!

Arts from Scratch.mit.edu
